name: Dr. Ayesha Rahman
description: Dr. Ayesha Rahman specializes in internal medicine with over a decade of experience in diagnosing and treating complex medical conditions. With a commitment to restoring mobility and improving quality of life, he combines advanced surgical techniques with personalized patient care. He has successfully treated numerous cases of complex fractures, sports injuries, and degenerative bone conditions.
